original_title: Cabinet nod to import, add value and re-export selected spices
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers approved the proposal presented by the President in his capacity as the Minister of Investment Promotion to implement the procedure for the import and processing of selected spices and re-export the same in the form of oil extraction, oleoresin and residue.
